name: Ionnect
description:
Complete the compounds based on the tips given at the bottom of the screen.

Neutralize them by making sure all "electrons" are "bonded" to another, and in a proper configuration.

You can drag atoms and scroll while dragging to rotate them.

Based on IGCSE Chemistry syllabus, but prior knowledge is not required (it can help) when playing this game.

Made for LD38.

COVALENT BONDING

TO

sharing electrons among non-metals

IONIC BONDING

TO

transfer of electron from metal to non-metal
